Package ut.twente.notebridge.routes

Class PersonRoute

java.lang.Object
ut.twente.notebridge.routes.PersonRoute
@Path("/persons") public class PersonRoute extends Object
This class is used to handle person-related routes. CRUD operations for persons are defined here. Necessary authorization checks using user session is also implemented.

    • putImage

      @PUT @Path("{id}/image") @Consumes("multipart/form-data") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response putImage(@PathParam("id") Integer id, InputStream uploadedInputStream, org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition fileDetail, @Context jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method is used to upload an image for a Person for their profile picture. The image is stored in the filesystem and the path is stored in the database.
      Returns:
      The response with the updated person

    • getImage

      @GET @Path("{id}/image") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getImage(@PathParam("id") Integer id)
      This method is used to get the image of a person, which is stored through the previous method. The image is read from the filesystem and returned as a response.
      Returns:
      The response with the image

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the person
      Returns:
      The response with the id

      This method is used to get all interested posts of a given person.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of a given person.
      Returns:
      The response with the interested posts

    • isContact

      @GET @Path("/contact/{requestedUserId}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response isContact(@PathParam("requestedUserId") int requestedUserId, @Context jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method is used to check if a person is a contact of another person.
      Parameters:
      requestedUserId - The id of the person to be checked
      Returns:
      The response with the result, either true or false.

    • addContact

      @POST @Path("/contact/{requestedUserId}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response addContact(@PathParam("requestedUserId") int requestedUserId, @Context jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method is used to add a person as a contact of another person.
      Parameters:
      requestedUserId - The id of the person to be added as a contact
      Returns:
      The response with the result
